stories.fact: Secretary of State Marco Rubio characterized the United States as a critical friend to allies. Iran and the United States are scheduled to hold nuclear talks in Geneva, according to a Swiss government official. Secretary of State Marco Rubio plans to visit eastern Europe. Russia claims to have captured a dozen Ukrainian villages ahead of the talks.
stories.source: BBC News 9.5*|9.0 · Reuters 9.9*|9.5 · PBS NewsHour 9.4*|9.0 · The Straits Times 7.0*|7.5 · Hindustan Times 7.4*|7.5

stories.fact: The U.S. military conducted airstrikes against Islamic State targets in Syria.
Prime Minister Viktor Orban of Hungary stated that the EU poses a greater threat than Russia ahead of April elections.
Five European nations stated that Alexei Navalny was poisoned and attributed responsibility to the Kremlin.
At least 30 people killed in north-west Nigerian villages.
Canada increased sanctions against Iran and stated it wants government change in Iran.
French prosecutors announced a special team to analyze Epstein files.
Four crew members arrived at the International Space Station as part of NASA's Crew-12 mission. The spacecraft used for the mission was SpaceX's Dragon.
Federal authorities opened a perjury investigation into testimony by ICE officers regarding a shooting involving a Venezuelan man.
stories.source: Associated Press 9.6*|9.5 · The Globe and Mail 9.0*|8.5

stories.fact: Israeli forces killed eight Palestinians in Gaza and conducted military operations in southern Lebanon.
stories.source: Al Jazeera English 7.6*|7.5 · EFE News Agency 6.2*|8.5

stories.fact: Australia pledges $2.7 billion for nuclear submarine shipyard construction.
Israeli airstrikes killed 9 people in Gaza, including in a tent camp, according to Palestinian officials.
More than 200,000 people gathered in Munich to rally in support of Reza Pahlavi.
Russia's Taman port sustains damage from a drone strike reported by Ukraine.
Pinheiro Braathen of Brazil won a gold medal at the Winter Olympics, earning South America's first Winter Olympics medal.
